property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, your opponent puts it on the bottom of their deck. TWINPACT ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, your opponent puts it on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle. {SUPER}When you put this creature into the battle zone, until the start of your next turn, your Jokers get +10000 power while battling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may put up to 3 cards from among them into your mana zone tapped and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Illusion, Iron Fist Stance / Teckenia Spark

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ If you have more creatures in the battle zone than your opponent, this creature doesn't leave the battle zone. TWINPACT ■ Tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Those creatures doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ If you have more creatures in the battle zone than your opponent, this creature doesn't leave the battle zone.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Those creatures doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.
